name: @acegoal07/file-tools
description: A package of easy to use tools for interacting with files using javascript

scripts.build: npm run buildTypes && cls && npm run tscBuild && cls && npm run copyFiles
scripts.build+publish: npm run build && cls && cd dist && cls && npm publish
scripts.copyFiles: xcopy /s/y src dist && xcopy /y package.json dist && xcopy /y readme.md dist && xcopy /y lICENSE dist

author: acegoal07
